summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel a certain assessment levied against Lot Four (4), Block Thirteen (13), Lakeview Addition to the City of Seattle, for the improvement of Latona Avenue, et al, by constructing water mains therein, as provided for in Ordinance No. 10677, creating Local Improvement District No. 896, and appropriating money therefor, and repealing Ordinance No. 13407, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing the City Treasurer to cancel a certain assessment levied against Lot Four (4), Block Thirteen (13), Lakeview Addition, for the improvement of Latona Avenue, by constructing water mains therein, as provided for in Ordinance No. 10677, creating Local Improvement District No. 896 and appropriating money therefor," approved March 14, 1906.
